data.title: History
data.meta_description: Established in 1833, the University of Cincinnati College of Law is the fourth oldest continuously operating law school in the country. The Cincinnati Law School became a department of the Cincinnati College in 1835, which gave it the authority to confer degrees. Until 1885, Cincinnati was the only law school in Ohio.
data.meta_site_name: University of Cincinnati College of Law
